column1: The Pit Room////I've tried a small portion of their menu
column2: but my recommendations would be their Chicken/Brisket Sandwich. Its delicious flavor that starts with a savory smoke flavor to complement their expertly spiced seasoning. For sides
column3: I would strongly recommend their pinto beans
column4: its spicy and has the right amount of kick to complement any protein you decide to order. I've ordered their macaroni
column5: but I don't remember my opinion on it.
